item.title: 账单飙升，波士顿市长再次推动房主减税
item.description: 波士顿市长米歇尔-吴（Michelle Wu）正试图重启一项失败的努力，以减轻房产税增幅达到两位数的房主的负担。【原文：Boston Mayor Michelle Wu is attempting to revive a failed effort to ease the burden on homeowners hit with double-digit increases in their property taxes.】

item.title: 康卡斯特将收购 76 人队少数股份，加入新球场合资企业
item.description: 康卡斯特公司和 Harris Blitzer Sports & Entertainment 同意成立一家 50-50 合资企业，在南费城体育中心建造 NBA 费城 76 人队和曲棍球飞人队的新场馆。【原文：Comcast Corp. and Harris Blitzer Sports & Entertainment agreed to a 50-50 joint venture to build the NBA’s Philadelphia 76ers and hockey’s Flyers a new arena in the South Philadelphia Sports Complex.】

item.title: 阿尔伯塔省省长警告：特朗普的关税即将到来，并将包括石油在内
item.description: 艾伯塔省省长丹妮尔-史密斯（Danielle Smith）在佛罗里达州会见当选总统后警告说，一旦唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）下周就任总统，加拿大人应做好面对美国关税的准备，石油将不会得到豁免。【原文：Canadians should be prepared to face US tariffs once Donald Trump assumes the presidency next week, with no exemptions for oil, Alberta Premier Danielle Smith warned after meeting the president-elect in Florida.】

item.title: 稳定币发行商 Tether 将在萨尔瓦多设立总部，并迁移部门
item.description: 稳定币发行商 Tether Holdings Ltd. 在中美洲国家萨尔瓦多获得数字资产服务提供商许可证后，将把公司实体和子公司迁往该国。【原文：Stablecoin issuer Tether Holdings Ltd. will move its corporate entity and subsidiaries to El Salvador after securing a digital asset service provider license in the Central American nation.】

item.title: 贝宁出售 7.5 亿美元债券的计划面临窗口期缩小的问题
item.description: 贝宁发行 7.5 亿美元债券的机会之窗正在缩小，因为收益率已接近三年前迫使非洲借款人搁置融资计划的水平。【原文：The window of opportunity for Benin to offer $750 million of bonds is narrowing as yields approach levels that three years ago forced African borrowers to put their financing plans on hold.】

item.title: 新山即将达成收购 Access Healthcare 的交易
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，新山资本（New Mountain Capital）即将收购 Access Healthcare，该交易可能会使这家收入周期管理集团的估值达到约 20 亿美元。【原文：New Mountain Capital is nearing an acquisition of Access Healthcare in a deal that could value the revenue cycle management group at about $2 billion, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 纽约联储调查显示，美国消费者认为未来通胀将更加强劲
item.description: 纽约联邦储备银行（Federal Reserve Bank of New York）的月度调查显示，美国消费者表示，他们认为未来几年的通胀率将高于此前的预期，这是11月大选后人们对物价日益担忧的最新迹象。【原文：US consumers said they see higher inflation over the next few years than previously thought, a monthly Federal Reserve Bank of New York survey showed, in the latest sign of mounting concerns about prices following November’s elections.】

item.title: 爱尔兰将加强北欧和波罗的海联盟以获得欧盟影响力
item.description: 随着唐纳德-特朗普政府的上台，都柏林与美国的关系可能会受到削弱，而爱尔兰正在寻找欧盟更东边的盟友，以便在欧盟中获得更多的影响力。【原文：Ireland is looking for allies further east in the European Union to gain more leverage in the bloc at a time when Dublin’s ties with the US are likely to weaken with the incoming Donald Trump administration.】

item.title: 避开中国，资产管理公司寻求加倍巴西风险敞口
item.description: 资产管理公司 Change Global Investment LLC 希望在年底前将巴西股票的持仓量增加一倍，同时努力削减中国股票的持仓量，并进军发展中国家一些折扣最大的市场。【原文：Asset manager Change Global Investment LLC wants to double its exposure to Brazilian stocks by year-end as it works to slash China holdings and move into some of the most discounted markets across the developing world.】

item.title: 财政部长皮克表示，加纳必须进一步削减开支
item.description: 卡西尔-阿托-福森（Cassiel Ato Forson）即将成为加纳下一任财政部长，他说，这个西非国家必须采取更多措施削减开支，以稳定正在努力从债务危机中复苏的经济。【原文：Cassiel Ato Forson, who’s poised to become Ghana’s next finance minister, said the West African nation must do more to cut spending to stabilize an economy that’s struggling to recover from a debt crisis.】

item.title: 尽管英国市场陷入困境，但英国央行债券销售需求依然强劲
item.description: 尽管最近的市场动荡引发了要求英格兰银行暂停量化紧缩计划的呼声，但英格兰银行还是成功出售了7.5亿英镑（9.11亿美元）的金边债券。【原文：The Bank of England successfully sold £750 million ($911 million) of gilts despite recent market turmoil that has prompted calls for it to pause its quantitative-tightening program.】

item.title: 索罗斯校友的机会型信贷基金 2024 年净值为 13
item.description: 根据彭博新闻社看到的一份与投资者共享的信件，欧洲机会主义信贷经理切普斯托-莱恩资本公司（Chepstow Lane Capital）在 2024 年录得 13.24% 的净回报。【原文：European opportunistic credit manager Chepstow Lane Capital recorded net returns of 13.24% in 2024, according to a letter shared with investors and seen by Bloomberg News.】

item.title: Blackstone 提升 Baratta，旗舰基金的 Brand 也得到加强
item.description: Blackstone Inc. 将提升其私募股权投资部门的两位重要高管。【原文：Blackstone Inc. is elevating two key executives at its private equity arm.】

item.title: 伊利诺伊州众议院增设养老金小组 预算缺口不断扩大
item.description: 伊利诺伊州众议院议长克里斯-韦尔奇（Chris Welch）希望通过预算视角来审查该州资金不足的养老金问题，因为立法机构希望在来年弥补可能出现的 30 亿美元赤字。【原文：Illinois House Speaker Chris Welch wants to vet the state’s underfunded pensions through a budgetary lens as the legislature looks to close a potentially $3 billion deficit for the year ahead.】

item.title: 2024 年俄罗斯石油收入预算飙升近三分之一
item.description: 去年，在原油价格上涨的刺激下，俄罗斯国家预算的石油收入增加了近三分之一，达到至少 2018 年以来的最高水平，因为该国正在适应国际制裁。【原文：Russia’s oil proceeds to the state budget increased by almost a third last year to the highest since at least 2018, spurred by higher crude prices as the nation adapted to international sanctions.】

item.title: 土耳其将在出生率下降之际增加鼓励生育的措施
item.description: 土耳其总统雷杰普-塔伊普-埃尔多安（Recep Tayyip Erdogan）扩大了对家庭和新婚夫妇的财政承诺，以鼓励生育，因为人口减少可能会拖累经济增长。【原文：Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan broadened financial pledges for families and newlyweds to encourage births amid a shrinking population likely to weigh on economic growth.】

item.title: 他信概述重振低迷泰国股市的步骤
item.description: 泰国执政党的实际领导人他信-西那瓦呼吁加强监管、改善公司治理并为长期股票投资者提供税收优惠，以重振人们对泰国股市的信心。【原文：Thaksin Shinawatra, the de facto chief of Thailand’s ruling party, called for tighter regulatory oversight, better corporate governance and tax incentives for long-term equity investors to revive confidence in the country’s stock market.】

item.title: 政治动荡让加拿大贸易商重回原点
item.description: 在多伦多海湾街（Bay Street）上上下下，投资者和策略师们正在重写加拿大股票的游戏规则。原因自然是唐纳德-特朗普。【原文：Up and down Toronto’s Bay Street, investors and strategists are rewriting the playbook for Canadian stocks. The reason, naturally, is Donald Trump.】

item.title: 中国证券监管机构誓言努力稳定市场
item.description: 在新年伊始令人失望之后，中国最高证券监管机构表示将致力于建立稳定市场的机制，誓言在2025年锚定市场预期。【原文：China’s top securities regulator said it will work on building a mechanism to stabilize the market, vowing to anchor market expectations in 2025 after a disappointing start to the new year.】

item.title: 地区性银行动荡后，精英预科学校涌入市镇银行市场
item.description: 就在斯坦福大学附近，帕洛阿尔托地区的一所精英私立学校正在进行耗资约 2 亿美元的校园升级改造，计划包括最先进的教室、水上运动中心和录音室。【原文：Just down the road from Stanford University, a roughly $200 million campus upgrade is underway at one of the Palo Alto area’s elite private schools, with plans encompassing state-of-the-art classrooms, an aquatics center and a recording studio.】

item.title: 农作物价格持续低迷，预计 2026 年前美国农业不会复苏
item.description: 根据农业贷款机构 AgAmerica 周一的展望，农作物价格低、种子和机械成本高意味着美国农业部门的反弹要到明年才会开始。【原文：Low crop prices and high costs for seeds and machinery mean a rebound in the American farm sector won’t start until next year, according to an outlook Monday from farm lender AgAmerica.】

item.title: Nvidia 与 Illumina 和梅奥诊所合作推动健康事业发展
item.description: Nvidia 公司宣布与 Illumina 公司、梅奥诊所和其他医疗机构建立合作关系，以此推动该行业采用人工智能。【原文：Nvidia Corp. announced tie-ups with Illumina Inc., the Mayo Clinic and other health-care organizations as part of its push to encourage the adoption of artificial intelligence by that industry.】

item.title: 苹果新应用收费引发欧盟对大科技规则的更多审查
item.description: 苹果公司（Apple Inc. ）对应用程序开发商收取的新费用正受到欧盟反垄断监管机构的新一轮审查，因为人们担心这些费用可能会推高软件制造商的成本。【原文：Apple Inc.’s revamped fees for app developers are under fresh scrutiny from European Union antitrust regulators amid concerns they could drive up costs for software makers.】

item.title: Sage Therapeutics 因收到百健公司 4.69 亿美元的收购要约而一跃而起
item.description: 在百健公司（Biogen Inc）提出以约 4.69 亿美元的价格收购这家专注于神经科学的制药商后，赛杰治疗公司（Sage Therapeutics Inc.【原文：Shares of Sage Therapeutics Inc. surged after Biogen Inc. offered to acquire the neuroscience-focused drugmaker for about $469 million.】

item.title: Sonos首席执行官因应用程序改版失败导致客户不满而离职
item.description: Sonos Inc.首席执行官帕特里克-斯彭斯（Patrick Spence）在任职八年后即将离职。【原文：Sonos Inc. Chief Executive Officer Patrick Spence is leaving after eight years in the job, a move that follows a botched app revamp that upset customers and stymied growth.】
